scripts.build:detect: browserify src/js/detect.js -o dist/detect.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.build:music: browserify src/js/music.js -o dist/music.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.watch:detect: watchify src/js/detect.js -o dist/detect.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.watch:music: watchify src/js/music.js -o dist/music.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
